body_html:
Got it. Did you expect to have a batch_size of 2000? It seems like the batch_size variable you passed to cell.zero_state was 2000.
…
On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:41 PM, Kevin Shaw ***@***.***> wrote: @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> : Thanks for replying. initial_state is shown at the top of the original post here. body:
Got it.  Did you expect to have a batch_size of 2000?  It seems like the
batch_size variable you passed to cell.zero_state was 2000.

On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:41 PM, Kevin Shaw <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> : Thanks for replying. initial_state
> is shown at the top of the original post here.
> Reprinting:

>
